# The use of camera on ubuntu and calibaration

``` 
roslaunch usb_cam usb_cam-test.launch
rosrun camera_calibration cameracalibrator.py --size 8x6 --square 0.02472 image:=/usb_cam/image_raw camera:=/usb_cam
```
